item.title: Version 1.2.17 (Build 20251230.2)
item.description:
What's New

feat: Add TempOffToolbar for quick toggling of Vietnamese input

Introduces a floating toolbar that allows users to temporarily disable

spell checking and/or Vietnamese engine processing without navigating

to settings. Perfect for mixed-language typing scenarios.

Features:

  • Floating toolbar with two toggle buttons (spelling/engine)
  • Auto-shows when focusing text fields (using Accessibility API)
  • Hotkey Cmd+Option+T to toggle toolbar visibility
  • Automatically hides when non-text elements are focused
  • Toolbar state persists during session but resets on app restart

Implementation:

  • TempOffToolbarController: Manages toolbar visibility and state
  • TempOffToolbarView: SwiftUI-based floating UI
  • AX focus monitoring: Detects text fields (TextField, TextArea, etc.)
  • Engine integration: vTempOffSpelling and vTempOffEngine flags

Settings:

  • Added tempOffToolbarEnabled preference in Advanced section
  • Hotkey and auto-detection can be toggled independently
